text: @rparks1985 what’s wrong with being a soft homo? no ones stopping you for being a man. although the ad is stopping men from promoting toxic masculinity which you’re clearly presenting right now. maybe look up the definition? get educated. they aren’t telling you to stop being a man, nor are they shaming you for it. they’re promoting a safe and inclusive environment for all.
How much of a retard would you need to be to think the Gillette advert was anti Male?
@summerlily1 no such thing as toxic masculinity. That’s bullshit. You can’t shame a man for being his natural self. What u want him to be. A soft homo? Lol

Now don't get me wrong, I think that sexual harrassment, bullying and what not is totally unacceptable and would be the first to step up for women in a situation.  I think "those" men can be better. So do "those" women. The problem here is it seems like men are ALL put in the same spot rather than saying that it's a minority of men acting this way, which should be condemned for their inappropriate behaviors.

I just don't think that the source of the message is appropriate. Gillette has been a compagny that for decades would encourage men to shave in order to have all the women they wish for while at the same time charging a higher price to women for the same exact products. I just feel there's a little bit of hypocrisy here.
I loved the commercial. It is time to step up. I think it’s beautiful and empowering. Honestly it should only offend men, who mistreat men or bully people. It’s a powerful message.

😂😂😂😂😂 This is hilarious!!! Women like men with Beards too so yes please grow your beard out or switch to another brand and shave because we like clean shaven men too.. 😂 That “woman” behind the commercial will still have her job and Gillette has been around since dinosaurs roamed so they’ll be okay too 😂😂😂 Why are we throwing “Mantrums”. Lmao.  Someone actually threw their razor in the toilet and posted it on social media.  Toxic masculinity does exist Rob. Doesn’t mean the commercial is about you or maybe it is 🤷🏽‍♀️
